name: Ebaumsworld.com Cleaner v2
description:
I like watching funny videos, but I absolutely hate everything that isn't the videos, the title or the description. Hence why I make "Cleaner" scripts.
I removed the comments, the ads, the sharing links, the footer, video info and centered the content. Some more things, I don't remember.

This style is a constant work in progress. I'll update it as new crap pops up.


Suggestions are welcome, it's possible I forgot something.
